00233     /**
00234      * 
00235      */
00236     public function __construct()
00237     {
00238         $this->prefixId = get_class( $this );
00239         
00240         $this->_cssPrefix = str_replace( '_', '-', $this->prefixId );
00241         
00242         $this->_reflection = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00243         
00244         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00245             
00246             self::_setStaticVars();
00247         }
00248         
00249         $this->_pluginNumber  = substr( $this->prefixId, -1 );
00250         
00251         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00252         
00253         $pluginFile = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00254         $pluginDir  = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00255         
00256         $this->scriptRelPath = $pluginDir . '/' . $pluginFile;
00257         
00258         $this->extKey  = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00259         
00260         $this->_extDir = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->extKey );
00261         
00262         $this->_uploadDirectory = str_replace(
00263             PATH_site,
00264             '',
00265             t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->extKey ) . '/' )
00266         );
00267         
00268         $this->_url = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv( 'TYPO3_REQUEST_URL' );
00269         
00270         $this->_time = time();
00271         
00272         $this->_piData = tx_oop_Session_Data_Frontend::getInstance( $this->prefixId );
00273         
00274         $this->_lang = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->extKey . '/lang/pi' . $this->_pluginNumber . '.xml' );
00275         
00276         $this->_content            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00277         $this->_content[ 'class' ] = $this->_cssPrefix;
00278     }

00280     /**
00281      * 
00282      */
00283     private static function _setStaticVars()
00284     {
00285         self::$_db                  = tx_oop_Database_Layer::getInstance();
00286         self::$_str                 = tx_oop_String_Utils::getInstance();
00287         self::$_tsfe                = $GLOBALS[ 'TSFE' ];
00288         self::$_t3Db                = $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_DB' ];
00289         self::$_t3Lang              = $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ];
00290         self::$_tcaDescr            = $GLOBALS[ 'TCA_DESCR' ];
00291         self::$_tca                 = $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ];
00292         self::$_client              = $GLOBALS[ 'CLIENT' ];
00293         self::$_t3Conf              = $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ];
00294         self::$_oopPath             = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( 'oop' );
00295         self::$_oopRelativePath     = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( 'oop' );
00296         self::$_oopSiteRelativePath = t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath( 'oop' );
00297         self::$_hasStatic           = true;
00298     }

00300     /**
00301      * 
00302      */
00303     private function _addJs( $path )
00304     {
00305         $js                 = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00306         $js[ 'type' ]       = 'text/javascript';
00307         $js[ 'charset' ]    = 'utf-8';
00308         $js[ 'src' ]        = self::$_oopSiteRelativePath . 'res/javascript/' . $path;
00309         
00310         $GLOBALS[ 'TSFE' ]->additionalHeaderData[ 'tx_oop_' . $path ] = ( string )$js;
00311     }
00312     
00313     /**
00314      * 
00315      */
00316     protected function _registerHook( $name, array $params = array() )
00317     {
00318         if( isset( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->extKey ][ $name ] )
00319             && is_array( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->extKey ][ $name ] )
00320         ) {
00321             
00322             foreach( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->extKey ][ $name ] as $callBack ) {
00323                 
00324                 t3lib_div::callUserFunction( $callBack, $params, $this ); 
00325             }
00326         }
00327     }

00329     /**
00330      * 
00331      */
00332     protected function _cssClass( $name, tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag $tag = NULL )
00333     {
00334         if( $tag ) {
00335             
00336             $tag[ 'class' ] = $this->_cssPrefix . '-' . $name;
00337             
00338         } else {
00339             
00340             return $this->_cssPrefix . '-' . $name;
00341         }
00342     }
00343     
00344     /**
00345      * Creates a select menu with countries from the 'static_countries' table
00346      * 
00347      * @param   string              The name of the select
00348      * @param   boolean             Wheter to add an empty option at start
00349      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The select menu with the countries
00350      */
00351     protected function _countrySelect( $name, $emptyOptionAtStart = true )
00352     {
00353         $select = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'select' );
00354         $select[ 'name' ] = $this->prefixId . '[' . $name . ']';
00355         $select[ 'size' ] = 1;
00356         
00357         if( $emptyOptionAtStart ) {
00358             
00359             $empty            = $select->option;
00360             $empty[ 'value' ] = '';
00361         }
00362         
00363         // SQL instruction to select the countries
00364         $sql = 'SELECT uid,cn_short_en FROM static_countries WHERE uid ORDER BY cn_short_en';
00365         
00366         // Prepares the PDO query
00367         $query = self::$_db->prepare( $sql );
00368         
00369         // Executes the PDO query
00370         $query->execute( array() );
00371         
00372         // Process each row
00373         while( $row = $query->fetchObject() ) {
00374             
00375             // Adds an option tag
00376             $option            = $select->option;
00377             $option[ 'value' ] = $row->uid;
00378             $option->addTextData( $row->cn_short_en );
00379         }
00380         
00381         // Returns the select box
00382         return $select;
00383     }
00384     
00385     /**
00386      * Establish a frontend user session
00387      * 
00388      * @param   array   The FE user row from the database
00389      * @return  NULL
00390      */
00391     protected function _feLogin( $user )
00392     {
00393         // Ensures the user variable is an array (may be an object with PDO)
00394         $user = ( array )$user;
00395         
00396         // Fills POST variables with login infos
00397         $_POST[ 'logintype' ] = 'login';
00398         $_POST[ 'user' ]      = $user[ 'username' ];
00399         $_POST[ 'pass' ]      = $user[ 'password' ];
00400         $_POST[ 'pid' ]       = $user[ 'pid' ];
00401         
00402         // Initializes the FE user
00403         $GLOBALS[ 'TSFE' ]->initFEuser();
00404         
00405         // Cleans up the POST variables
00406         unset( $_POST[ 'logintype' ] );
00407         unset( $_POST[ 'user' ] );
00408         unset( $_POST[ 'pass' ] );
00409         unset( $_POST[ 'pid' ] );
00410     }
00411     
00412     /**
00413      * Creates a thumbnail
00414      * 
00415      * @param   string  The file path (relative to the upload directory). May be a comma list of path
00416      * @param   int     The thumbnail maximum width
00417      * @param   int     The thumbnail maximum height
00418      * @param   boolean Wheter to add a link to display the original image in a new window
00419      * @param   int     The maximum width of the new window, if the $newWindow is set
00420      * @return  string  The thumbnail picture(s)
00421      */
00422     protected function _createThumbnail( $file, $width = 100, $height = 100, $newWindow = false, $newWindowWidth = 800 )
00423     {
00424         $tsConf = array(
00425             'file.' => array(
00426                 'maxW' => $width,
00427                 'maxH' => $height
00428             )
00429         );
00430         
00431         if( $newWindow ) {
00432             
00433             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap' ]                             = 1;
00434             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ]                            = array();
00435             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'enable' ]                = 1;
00436             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'wrap' ]                  = '<a href="javascript:self.close();">|</a>';
00437             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'width' ]                 = $newWindowWidth . 'm';
00438             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'JSwindow' ]              = 1;
00439             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'JSwindow.' ]             = array();
00440             $tsConf[ 'imageLinkWrap.' ][ 'JSwindow.' ][ 'expand' ] = '20,20';
00441         }
00442         
00443         $paths   = explode( ',', $file );
00444         $content = '';
00445         
00446         foreach( $paths as $path ) {
00447             
00448             $tsConf[ 'file' ] = $this->_uploadDirectory . $path;
00449             $content         .= $this->cObj->IMAGE( $tsConf );
00450         }
00451         
00452         return $content;
00453     }

00455     /**
00456      * Includes the jQuery JS framework
00457      * 
00458      * @return  NULL
00459      */
00460     protected function _includeJQuery()
00461     {
00462         // Only includes the script once
00463         if( self::$_hasJQuery === false ) {
00464             
00465             // Adds the JS script
00466             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery.js' );
00467             
00468             // Script has been included
00469             self::$_hasJQuery = true;
00470         }
00471     }
00472     
00473     /**
00474      * Includes the jQuery UI JS framework
00475      * 
00476      * @return  NULL
00477      */
00478     protected function _includeJQueryUi()
00479     {
00480         // Only includes the script once
00481         if( self::$_hasJQueryUi === false ) {
00482             
00483             // Adds the JS script
00484             $this->_addJs( 'jquery-ui/jquery-ui.js' );
00485             
00486             // Script has been included
00487             self::$_hasJQueryUi = true;
00488         }
00489     }

00499         if( self::$_hasMootools === false ) {

00509     /**
00510      * Includes the Prototype JS framework
00511      * 
00512      * @return  NULL
00513      */
00514     protected function _includePrototype()
00515     {
00516         // Only includes the script once
00517         if( self::$_hasPrototype === false ) {
00518             
00519             // Adds the JS script
00520             $this->_addJs( 'prototype/prototype.js' );
00521             
00522             // Script has been included
00523             self::$_hasPrototype = true;
00524         }

00526     
00527     /**
00528      * Includes the Scriptaculous JS framework
00529      * 
00530      * @return  NULL
00531      * @see     _includePrototype
00532      */
00533     protected function _includeScriptaculous()
00534     {
00535         // Only includes the script once
00536         if( self::$_hasScriptaculous === false ) {
00537             
00538             // Includes the Prototype JS framework
00539             $this->_includePrototype();
00540             
00541             // Adds the JS script
00542             $this->_addJs( 'scriptaculous/scriptaculous.js' );
00543             
00544             // Script has been included
00545             self::$_hasScriptaculous = true;
00546         }
00547     }
00548     
00549     /**
00550      * Includes a Webtoolkit script
00551      * 
00552      * Available scripts are:
00553      * - base64
00554      * - crc32
00555      * - md5
00556      * - sha1
00557      * - sha256
00558      * - url
00559      * - utf8
00560      * 
00561      * @param   string  The name of the script to include
00562      * @return  NULL
00563      */
00564     protected function _includeWebtoolkitScript( $script )
00565     {
00566         // Only includes the script once
00567         if( !isset( self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] ) ) {
00568             
00569             // Adds the JS script
00570             $this->_addJs( 'webtoolkit/' . $script . '.js' );
00571             
00572             // Script has been included
00573             self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] = true;
00574         }
00575     }
00576     
00577     /**
00578      * Includes a jQuery plugin
00579      * 
00580      * Available plugins are:
00581      * - accordion
00582      * - dimensions
00583      * 
00584      * @param   string  The name of the plugin to include
00585      * @return  NULL
00586      */
00587     protected function _includeJQueryPlugin( $plugin )
00588     {
00589         // Only includes the script once
00590         if( !isset( self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00591             
00592             // Checks for dependancies
00593             if( isset( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00594                 
00595                 // Process each dependancy
00596                 foreach( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] as $deps ) {
00597                     
00598                     // Includes the plugin
00599                     $this->_includeJQueryPlugin( $deps );
00600                 }
00601             }
00602             
00603             // Adds the JS script
00604             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery' . $plugin . '.js' );
00605             
00606             // Script has been included
00607             self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] = true;
00608         }
00609     }
00610     
00611     /**
00612      * 
00613      */
00614     protected function _getFrontendTemplate( $path )
00615     {
00616         return new tx_oop_Frontend_Template(
00617             $this->cObj,
00618             $path
00619         );
00620     }
00621     
00622     /**
00623      * 
00624      */
00625     public function main( $content, $conf )
00626     {
00627         // Stores the TypoScript configuration
00628         $this->conf = $conf;
00629         
00630         // Sets the default plugin variables
00631         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00632         
00633         // Initialize the flexform configuration of the plugin
00634         $this->pi_initPIflexForm();
00635         
00636         // Creates the plugin content (from the child class)
00637         $this->_getPluginContent( $this->_content );
00638         
00639         // Returns the plugin content
00640         return ( string )$this->_content;
00641     }
